---
title: "Analyses by State"
format: html
---
 
To preview the data, each state has an analysis page with graphs and additional information. States can be opened by pressing the buttons below or by clicking on a state on the [home page](https://www.rpvnearme.org/).


```{r, echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)

tibble(
  abb = state.abb, 
  state = sapply(abb, censable::match_name),
  link = stringr::str_glue('https://electionlawclinic.github.io/rpvnearme/analyses/{abb}_2020.html')
) |> 
  pmap(function(link, state, ...) {
        htmltools::a(
      href = link,
      htmltools::tags$button(class = "link-btn",
                             htmltools::tags$i(class = "fa fa-link"),
                             str_glue('Open {state}')),
      htmltools::tags$br()
    )
  }) |> 
  htmltools::as.tags()
```
